SEARCH
Package cz.vse.swoe.ontodeside.patomat2.service

Interface OntologyHolder

All Known Implementing Classes:
Rdf4jOntologyHolder
public interface OntologyHolder
Manages ontology and allows finding matches in it.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    applyTransformationQuery(String sparqlUpdate)
    Applies the specified SPARQL Update to the loaded ontology.
    void
    clear()
    Clears the holder, discarding the previously loaded ontology.
    OntologyDiff
    difference(File otherOntologyFile)
    Calculates the difference of the loaded and the specified ontologies.
    ByteArrayOutputStream
    export(String mimeType)
    Exports the currently loaded ontology.
    List<PatternMatch>
    findMatches(Pattern pattern)
    Finds matches of the specified pattern in the loaded ontology.
    Optional<String>
    getLabel(String iri)
    Resolves label of a resource with the specified iri.
    Optional<String>
    getOntologyIri()
    Resolves IRI of the loaded ontology, if available.
    boolean
    isLoaded()
    Checks whether any ontology has been loaded by this holder.
    void
    loadOntology(File ontologyFile)
    Loads ontology from the specified file.

  • Method Details

    • isLoaded

      boolean isLoaded()
      Checks whether any ontology has been loaded by this holder.
      Returns:
      true if an ontology has been loaded

    • loadOntology

      void loadOntology(@NonNull File ontologyFile)
      Loads ontology from the specified file.
      Parameters:
      ontologyFile - File containing ontology

    • getOntologyIri

      Optional<String> getOntologyIri()
      Resolves IRI of the loaded ontology, if available.
      Returns:
      Ontology IRI, possibly empty

    • getLabel

      Optional<String> getLabel(@NonNull String iri)
      Resolves label of a resource with the specified iri.
      Parameters:
      iri - Resource identifier
      Returns:
      Resource label (if found)

    • findMatches

      List<PatternMatch> findMatches(@NonNull Pattern pattern)
      Finds matches of the specified pattern in the loaded ontology.
      Parameters:
      pattern - Pattern definition
      Returns:
      List of found matches

    • applyTransformationQuery

      void applyTransformationQuery(@NonNull String sparqlUpdate)
      Applies the specified SPARQL Update to the loaded ontology.
      Parameters:
      sparqlUpdate - SPARQL Update to execute

    • export

      ByteArrayOutputStream export(@NonNull String mimeType)
      Exports the currently loaded ontology.
      Parameters:
      mimeType - MIME type of the exported ontology (e.g. "text/turtle")
      Returns:
      Exported ontology

    • clear

      void clear()
      Clears the holder, discarding the previously loaded ontology.

    • difference

      OntologyDiff difference(@NonNull File otherOntologyFile)
      Calculates the difference of the loaded and the specified ontologies.
      Parameters:
      otherOntologyFile - File containing the other ontology
      Returns:
      Ontology difference
